title: Owl
author: Little Fears

sentences.e48e: “That chuffing Owl, landed on me, crapped on me, pecked me, regurgitated bones on me then threatened to feed me to his chicks, for no darned reason.”

sentences.0536: “Huh,” said Magpie. “Maybe he has irritable owl syndrome?”

sentences.368c: LittleFears | Patreon | Etsy | Kindle | Skillshare| Threadless

content: Owl “Bloody Owl,” said Globe. “What’s up?” asked Magpie. “That chuffing Owl, landed on me, crapped on me, pecked me, regurgitated bones on me then threatened to feed me to his chicks, for no darned reason.” “Huh,” said Magpie. “Maybe he has irritable owl syndrome?” ~ LittleFears | Patreon | Etsy | Kindle | Skillshare| Threadless
